page.title: 01AN OVERVIEW
page.content: This is a{rural area}comprising parts of the parishes of Hartpury, Rudford and Highleadon and a small part of Tibberton. The{land surface}is undulating, with generally heavy soil over Keuper Marl. Rainfall averages 610mm. annually. The predominant{land {use}is agriculture with some woodland, and{settlement}consists largely of scattered dwellings. People living here look towards Gloucester as the nearest town, for shopping and other facilities and also for{employment}. {Educationally,}Gloucestershire College of Agriculture is reknowned nationally. Through fieldwork, interviews and a survey to 80 homes, we hope to have given an idea of life in the area today.
